mapper.select: SELECT homework.id homeworkId, homework.`name` homeworkName, class_homework.publish_time publishTime, answer_summary.submit_time submitTime, answer_summary.score score FROM homework LEFT JOIN class_homework ON homework.id = class_homework.homework_id LEFT JOIN student ON class_homework.class_id = student.class_id LEFT JOIN answer_summary ON answer_summary.homework_id = homework.id WHERE student.`no` = #{no} AND homework.course_id = #{courseId}

SELECT homework.id homeworkId, homework.name homeworkName, classes.id classId, classes.name className from homework JOIN class_homework ON homework.id = class_homework.homework_id JOIN classes ON class_homework.class_id = classes.id WHERE homework.course_id = #{id}
